ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Question Me This . . .
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks Stephanie! ... Another question for you or anyone. I ve heard that once you reach 10th lvl that dieing becomes more of an issue in that when you die you
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks Stephanie!
:o)

Another question for you or anyone.

I've heard that once you reach 10th lvl that dieing
becomes more of an issue in that when you die you have
to find your body within a certain time frame (7 days)
or you lose all the stuff you had on.
:o/
Right now I'm 9th lvl but this has got me a little
worried. Are there any good tricks to make sure that I
will be able to find myself after 10th lvl?
:o)
Also, what happens if you die in the ocean.

The other day my wood Elf was exploring near Freeport
and this Dark Elf was standing there next to the wall.
When I got near they attacked me. I tried to swim for
it back to where I knew some guards were but they hit
me while I was swimming and I woke up next to the soul
binder. :o)
What would happen once I am 10th level. Would I have
to go deep sea diving?
Just curious?

:o)
Brangvyne
